|stockos = CBOS v2.0;;; |exp_if_types = |pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 2.5 |pwr_conn = |pwr_barrel_outer = |pwr_barrel_inner = |pwr_barrel_len = |pwr_pol = |serial = RJ-45 |jtag = |specialfeat = |flags = ADSL |addchip = |802dot11_protocols = none |defaulip = |defaultlogin = |defaultpass = |defaultssid = |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = |manuf = |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |is_manuf = Yes |tpfirmware = |availability = EoL |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = |estreldate = 04/06/2001 |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = 9SIAHPG8100247 |asin = B00W4FMQTW |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = Mexico |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== The Cisco 675 was provided by U.S. West Communications to DSL subscribers in the USA. ==Links of Interest== *[https://docstore.mik.ua/univercd/cc/td/doc/product/dsl_prod/c600s/cbos/cbo210rn.htm Cisco Broadband Operating System (CBOS)] *[http://zerospace.org/c675/ ''Hacking Cisco 675 CBOS DSL router'' on '''ZeroSpace'''] ==JTAG-Serial Info== ===Serial===

NetSpeed HomeRunner(TM); i960 JX; JA step number 03                            
Copyright 1997 NetSpeed Corporation                                            
Copyright 1998, 1999 Cisco Systems

=>dasm 100081b0 8
100081b0 : 86003000 1000e3f0  callx  0x1000e3f0
100081b8 : 8c803000 100081a0  lda  0x100081a0, g0
100081c0 : 86003000 100083b0  callx  0x100083b0
100081c8 : 5ca01e00           mov  0, g4
100081cc : 5c801614           mov  g4, g0
100081d0 : 0a000000           ret  
100081d4 : 00000000           .word     0x00000000
100081d8 : 00000000           .word     0x00000000
